Authors: Thomas Christopher Giarla, Robert S Voss
Title:
DNA Sequence Data from the Holotype of Marmosa elegans
coquimbensis Tate, 1931 (Mammalia: Didelphidae) Resolve Its Disputed
Relationships
Abstract:
DNA sequence data obtained from the 96-year-old holotype
of Marmosa elegans coquimbensis Tate, 1931, support the hypothesis that
this nominal taxon is a synonym or subspecies of Thylamys elegans
(Waterhouse, 1839) and is not conspecific with T. pallidior (Thomas,
1902).
